name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForCOVID19ConfirmedInfection
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for COVID19 Confirmed Infection
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to confirmed COVID-19 infection. CMS official coding guidance from April 1st 2020 to Sept. 30th 2020 states code U07.1 should only be used for confirmed COVID-19 infection (documentation of a positive COVID-19 test result or a presumptive positive COVID-19 test result). Prior to April 1st 2020 coding guidance stated to use code B97.29 for confirmed COVID-19 infection (documentation of a positive COVID-19 test result or a presumptive positive COVID-19 test result).),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes confirmed diagnosis of COVID-19.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes lab tests confirming COVID-19 infection.)

concept.display: Other coronavirus as the cause of diseases classified elsewhere
